title.rendered: The perfect synergy: how trust is key

content.rendered:
Duaa Ibrahim, Project Manager – Asset Intelligence and John Bright, Operations Director, who are based at our Abu Dhabi site in the UAE, have co-authored a new thought leader article for OGV Energy’s latest Asset Integrity title. Duaa and John write about how opportunities are planned, developed and won. For a number of years, John has driven our close relationships with some of the world’s biggest energy companies based in the Arabian Gulf. Meanwhile, Duaa has been instrumental in propelling our new Asset Intelligence offering, an exciting software solution that can deliver a transformative shift in day-to-day operations and maintenance planning. This technology was recently integrated as a core element in a major contract win for the first time. Duaa and John’s story reflects so many of Proserv’s FRESH values around service standards, entrepreneurial spirit, collaboration, innovation and creativity.

Click to view article

This article is reproduced with the kind permission of OGV Energy. To read the article online, please click here.
